name: Toroban
description: Toroban is an infinitely wrapping puzzle game.

name: Bebop
description: Bebop is a private investigator that gets himself mixed with... THE MOB. And he regrets his actions, then comes back home a hero, after having tried to kill an innocent man and having tried to end him in a hospital.

name: FinalCypher
description: FinalCypher is a community-governed free-to-play team-based strategic hero FPS game developed by Station Zero X. FinalCypher utilizes bleeding-edge technology to empower players to truly own their in-game assets. Join the Kill-to-Earn era.

name: Restricted Footage
description: “Restricted Footage” is a horror and survival game for up to 4 players. You are entering into an area, where reportedly paranormal stuff is happening. Your purpose here is to take a footage with your action cam and to solve the paranormal case.

name: Word x Word
description: A battle of wits against a friend, or the computer! Reveal words to discover their common theme; gain enough points, and you'll secure a place on the hall of fame!

name: Labyrinth of Chaos
description: Medieval first-person game with dungeons and puzzles

name: Skera VR
description: Skera is a single-player puzzle-solving action adventure VR game. Imprisoned within a colossal Tower, you must work with and against the resident AI. Sword in hand, carve your way through puzzles, obstacles and enemies in order to reactivate the mysterious tower and return home.

name: The Prey's Turn
description: The Prey's Turn is an action platform where you are a cute animal and need to save your friends from predators. Now, It's the PREY'S TURN!

name: Mr Rex's Zealous Adventure
description: The Fast-paced Space Dinosaurs Adventure!​

name: Iron Side
description: Iron Side is an FPS with cool perks and features. It's unique gameplay style offers so much. Come join the community and you won't be disappointed.

name: Market Simulator
description: Run your own business as a market owner! Customize your shop, manage your stock, serve your customers and expand your business. While you are busy making money be careful with the robber!

name: Gambling Paradise: The Escape Call VR
description: Gambling Paradise: The Escape Call VR is a puzzle game which takes place in the ocean's depths. You play as a penguin thief who must guide his teammate to escape from the casino with the loot.

name: Blocktiful
description: A relaxing puzzle game where you combine resources and create your own amazing world.

name: Swimming Poo
description: Swimming Poo is a humorous action game that combines the arcade style of gameplay with the freedom of the sandbox world. It focuses on escaping from enemies, interacting with the world and fighting in its own unique way.

name: The Last Vagabonds
description: The Last Vagabonds is set in a zombie apocalypse. Fight against zombies and travel with a friend or alone through the forsaken world.

name: David Haye's Jungle Rumble
description: David has his jungle holiday interrupted by his arch-enemies. Take control of the former Heavy Weight Champion and apply the noble and gentlemanly art of boxing to the faces of all in his way!

name: Thomas & Friends: Race On!
description: Meet Thomas and his engines friends on the rail! With the new Augmented Reality (AR) and Voice Control function, meet your favorite engines in the real world and speak with them! You can also set up races, choose your favorite engines, and tap the screen to make the engines run faster to win races in this fun, kid-friendly racing adventure.

name: Ding Dong Delivery
description: The paperboy is all grown up and has graduated to delivering hot slices of pizza around town. Take control of a huge variety of vehicles, from tanks to boats and all in between. Dodge traffic and deliver as much food as you possibly can!

name: Rolling Rapids
description:
Take a crazy ride down the most adventurous river the App Store has to offer.
Roll, duck and jump your way out of incredible and ferocious obstacles like snapping crocodiles, polar bears, fishermen, piranhas and snakes!
Collect golden rubies to unlock and ride with the pirate ship, surfer dude, blue whale, jet ski, swimmer, dolphin, cruise ship, dragon and more!

name: J.J's Tennis Tour
description:
J.J is a rookie on the world tennis tour.
Travel around the world playing in the first to 5 tournaments against the top opponents.
Practice in the training zone to earn coins and customize J.J’s appearance as well as levelling up your skills to stand a better chance against your opponents.
J.J will make friends on the tour in the pre-tournament lobby as well as having to learn to deal with trash talking from opponents.
Can you help J.J become the world champion?

name: Toppluva
description: Hit the slopes and shred your way down the mountain! Ski through over 45 levels across 8 different mountains. Complete levels and missions to unlock new characters.

name: Racing Manager
description: Manage your very own Racing Team. Compete in amazing 3D in high action races, controlling your drivers orders and helping them boost to victory!

name: MimeDrink: The drinking game
description: The game works like a game of virtual cards. Placed randomly, they will generate sentences that a person will have to guess to his team to make their opponents drink. Most of the time, these sentences will be very easy to mimic despite their totally twisted and absurd content.

name: A Great Escape
description:
Run Run Run for your cat life
Simple game, simple play style, but it very interesting.
Play it and enjoy it

name: Hyperdrome
description:
Two cars. One race track. And a whole arsenal of power-ups. Welcome to the dynamic racing world of the future.
The first car across the finish line wins the race – that's how racing was and that's how racing will always be. Yet with ever-faster cars and perfected racing lines, motorsport soon became too predictable. In a bid to bring fun back to the sport, ways of combat, subterfuge, and special abilities were added to the cars.

name: Luminosus
description: Luminosus is a unique and challenging puzzle game that combines the fun of matching colors with the strategic gameplay of Tetris. In Luminosus, players must match 4 or more blocks of the same color to score points or combine them into other colors to score even bigger.

name: Fans of Soccer: Disc Football
description:
Are you ready to be the soccer legend and hero you always dreamed to be?
The time is now – the ball is in your court – run, take aim, strike….and…goal! You did it for your team and you are ready to lift the cup.
How exciting. And what if we tell you that you can experience this excitement every single day, whenever you please. Yes, with the Fans of Soccer game all you need is your smartphone to play soccer in true competitive style while competing with players from all over the world in online football-themed disc game matches gushing with adrenaline.

name: Railway Escape
description: Battle hundreds of monsters and survive as long as you can in Railway Escape. Protect your train at all costs and upgrade your arsenal of weapons to become more powerful in this Bullet Hell game. It is up to you to clear a path to safety for you and the passengers on the last train to freedom on earth. Exciting gameplay, hordes of monsters, many weapon combinations and thrilling music will make Railway Escape your goto game when you have a few minutes to spare.

name: Jumping Jack's Skydive
description:
Take Jumping Jack on a skydiving adventure through 5 worlds and 50 challenging levels! Guide Jack as he jumps out of the plane and drops through crazy and unbelievable obstacles — like the jumbo planes, hot air balloons, blimps, helicopters, drones, birds, UFOs and more!
You must fly Jack down after each plane drop and deploy the parachute at the right time in order to land successfully. Fly through the City, Desert, Ocean, Forest and Space!

name: Bobble Bunch: Ultimate Pet Adventure
description:
Bobble Bunch is the kind of game that might seem easy to play at first but it will instantly immerse you in an outlandish world that will turn your hands sweaty quite fast.
Travel through mesmerizing portals, avoid the green orbs and try not to get caught by the deadly electricity beam. Using simple controls, all you need are fast reactions and cunning timing in order to reach the blue saving light.
Bobble Bunch is all about guiding your bobble pets through a mysterious world while facing wicked obstacles and devilish traps.
Do you think you have what it takes to save them?

name: Hyperbahn
description: Engage yourself in a exciting fast paced mobile game where speed is unlimited. Control and maneuver a space jet spiraling through the confines of hyperspace. Collect energy orbs to gain points and the more orbs you collect the faster your space jet becomes. As you gain speed become cautious of the explosive red asteroids. If you come in contact with the asteroids your jet will explode upon impact.

name: Whack an Office Jerk
description:
Whack An Office Jerk & Boss is a free game, your chance to whack em all over the head, and experience a satisfying calm peaceful feeling....
after you kick some major butt!!!

name: Cubic Hole
description:
Enjoy in space,
3D three-dimensional puzzle game.
This game will be a help to improve intelligence.
Stage 60 kinds of mysterious and amazing puzzle game,

name: I Like Being With You
description: This is a sweet game in which the player control a rabbit running around the moon with another rabbit (his/her lover). The game is simple in control and has very pleasant grahpic and sweet music.

name: Deep Lake Reel Fishing
description:
Enjoy the ultimate pocket fishing experience!
Grab your bait, rod, and reel and head out on the lake for some deep lake reel fishing all around the world. New fish and locations added weekly!
The world of fishing is at your finger tops. Catch big or small fish, upgrade your gear, upgrade your skills, upgrade your fishing level...Compete with friends…
Become the ultimate mobile fisher!

name: Beach Boing
description: Young Timmy hates the sudden invasion of Yoga Beach fanatics on his favorite beach. Its time he really taught them how to let it go.

name: Pixel Cup Soccer
description: Pixel Cup Soccer is a retro-style arcade soccer game with simple controls and fun, addictive gameplay. Choose from 32 national teams to play friendly matches, the Pixel Cup championship, and awesome fun player-versus-player matches!

name: Nood Climbrs
description:
Bare-it-all in a risqué climb to the top!
In Nood Climbrs you control a noodley-limbed (and scantily clad) climber while they explore a carefully designed climbing wall, streak to new heights, and unlock outrageous new outfits.
Master the simple & unique climbing mechanic which challenges you to gain mastery over gravity and test the limits of your spaghetti-armed body!

name: Clash of Ultimate Fighters
description:
This is a must play Ultimate Fighter Shooter!
Make combinations of three or more head bubbles to score points. The more your shoot at once the more points you will get!
Take on the ultimate fighters alone or play with friends and get the highest score.

name: PetrolHead: Epic Joyride
description: Petrolhead will provide you the high quality graphics and the driving experience you are looking for. Test your overspeed skills and drift skills on asphalt. Push your limits and step forward to become a master driver! Complete the missions, own the best cars and challenge worldwide drivers!

name: Mighty Muddy
description: Time to get muddy! Race through a dirty world in this intense, high speed racing game. The muddier you get the better your score, but hold on tight, because you get extra points for getting air! Just how far and how muddy can you get before smashing into an obstacle? Get on the leaderboard today!

name: Turbo Grid
description:
In a far distant future, racing has evolved into a whole new dimension. Super fast space ships replaced traditional vehicles and gone all the known roads with new kind of challenge on a deep space racing track. It's dangerous as well, so are you up to this challenge?
Turbo Grid is a fast paced racing / shooting experience setup in a ray like race track. Your aim is to go as far as you can with simply tapping each side of the screen to dodge from the obstacles. Your ship is fast, but becomes faster with speed up sections during the race. You should also collect gun item to get shooting capability in order to clean your way. Shield item can be usefull to collect as it'll help you in any of your dodge mistake. Boost takes your ship's speed into another level where you can fly over many obstacles at a glance. Orbs are the currency in this future, so collect them as much as you can and also a magnet item can help you ease in this purpose.

name: Battle Cars
description:
Welcome to the world of Battle Cars.
Battle Cars is a classic arcade top-down racing game with fast mini cars and funny weapons to destroy your opponents!
Play the career mode to upgrade your cars and unlock new tracks, or go online to play with your friends

name: Jelly Zoo
description: Redeem your free ticket to the world’s first Jelly Zoo!

name: Triangle 180
description: Embark on an adventure to help Mi overcome 180 Triangle Trials! Create triangles and capture all the dots and goodies along your way to unearth the mystery behind the "Triangulum".

name: Bearadise 2: Big Bear Shuffle
description: Sin descripción

name: Hillbilly Burgers
description:
Welcome to Hillbilly Burgers!
Help Patty Motts stack as many hamburgers on his plate without them falling off!
How many can you stack?

name: Space Max
description:
Destination: Earth. Gas-engine: ON.
Get ready for a noisy takeoff! Help Max the Astronaut Monkey get back home with his high-tech jetpack, famously powered by eco-friendly flatulent energy. Rip through space thanks to this powerful yet all-natural gas that lets you fly higher and higher!
After a crash landing on planet Cowa-426, our brave hero discovered that the only way to get home was through the power of flatulence. Help him collect scrap metal to build powerful space suits. Careful though! The journey through space isn’t exactly a piece of cake (or cut of cheese…)! Watch out for space cows, asteroids, and other silent but deadly perils of the universe.

name: Pro Feel Golf
description: Pro Feel Golf brings a fresh approach with unique and innovative controls that allow ease of use but with depth to grow your game. Become a golfing legend using intuitive one touch controls.

name: Letterswirl
description: At last, a word game with splendor. Sit down with a friend and let Letterswirl’s mysterious vibe and unusual circular approach to spelling help you enjoy a meditative moment together. Or practice by yourself and see how you do on the global leaderboards. To really get into the flow, lose yourself in Timelapse mode, a circular word-search which will push your word-spotting abilities to the limits. As the clock accelerates, watch the stars turn above you and the skies blaze with electric fire.

name: Mine Battles
description: Mine Battles - Discovery of Mezopotamia is an action and adventure game with a single player game mode. Discovery of Mezophotamia, the second game in the Mine Battles series, is a single player game with a TPS-style perspective. Fight by doing missions and solve the secret of Mesopotamia.

name: Anime Knight: Card Game
description: Anime Knight: Card Game game that blends deckbuilding and turn-based strategies on a warzone. Combine different cards strategy to overcome unique challenges you will face. But be careful.

name: Intergalactic Panic!!
description: Jump and shoot your way through forgotten oceans and into fortresses filled with powerful enemies. Decide the best order to complete the challenges and each stage will give you an amazing new power to help you on your next journey and perhaps end the tyranny of the evil Intergalactic Empire.

name: The Neverland of the Mountain and Sea
description: Falling in love with a robot girl!

name: Animal Across: Afrika
description: Animal Across: Afrika is a puzzle game set in an African biome. Here you must feed endemic animals to this biome with their natural food.

name: Lightwood
description: Lightwood is an immersive semi-open world Metroidvania. Master your skills and fight magnificent Lords as you unravel the ancient mysteries behind the kingdom's decay.

name: Time's Disillusion
description: Time's Disillusion is a linear visual novel. It's been two years since a friend was lost. Despite everything, the final race ended in tension, a crash, and no hope of contact. Today, there's no time for those things at the restaurant; not in this downturn. That dream was over. Or so he thought.

name: Make me Float
description: Solve puzzles and overcome challenges with cooperation and “connection” … as a balloon

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - Hamburg Flyer SVT 877
description: The Hamburg Flyer, a train consisting of two cars – each having a driver's cab and passenger cabin – was ordered by the Deutsche Reichsbahn-Gesellschaft in 1932 from Waggon- und Maschinenbau AG Goerlitz (WUMAG). The train was delivered in 1932 and put into service in 1933.

name: That Last Girl
description: First person, Indie, horror survival game. Use light and sound-based strategies to evade the ghost and achieve objectives to unlock the extended ending.

name: Gloop
description: Gloop is a 3D platformer where you play as a parasitic slime that aims to take over the world. Control and infect creatures to cover the world in slime.

name: Tyler Tactics
description: Join Tyler Tactics on an absurd action-comedy adventure as he faces off against corrupt politicians, rival businessmen, and innocent bystanders alike.

name: XenoWorld: The Rondeau of Astra
description: "The Rondeau of Astra" is a war chess game that combines war chess, cards and Rogue. You will control the "Controller", defeat all enemies in the foggy forest level after level, and uncover the secrets of the different world "Astra Continent"......

name: Grey Galactic
description: Grey Galactic is a real time strategy game in space where you build up your planets and ships to conquer your enemies. Develop your planets and fleet of spaceships to destroy your enemies and take over the galaxy! Do you have what it takes to become the best Fleet Captain the UFMC has ever seen?

name: Cloudy Days
description: She is laughing next to me. The world may be ending.

name: Kai Yuan
description: This is a city building game with the historical background of the Tang Dynasty of China in the 7-8th century. In the game, you will build a prosperous city in the Tang Dynasty of China.

name: Floppy Disks from Hell
description: Help Floppy Disks to repair from the flames a broken cell phone due to a strange malfunction on a World scale!

name: Squid on Road
description: You're a squid who owns a car with a grappling hook. The road is full of bandits.

name: Wild Radio Flux
description: An Action Platformer Metroidvania RPG game for people of all ages. Choose your hero (or non-hero), grow his class, unlock new weapons and explore the galaxy to find and collect iconic music items from classical music throught out all music history. First season will be out soon in 2023!

name: RivenWorld: The First Era
description: Can you survive the unforgiving medieval world? Welcome to RivenWorld, an open-world, sandbox, survival multiplayer game based in the medieval era.

name: Secrets of Orion: Sword of Destiny.
description: A warrior who wandered in search of redemption after abdicating his post receives a call to return to his ancient continent. Explore the continent of Orion in a 2D action adventure with 3 endings according to your choices.

name: Ice Battle
description: We offer you Ice Battle - an arcade game with the mechanics of a hockey simulator. The game perfectly conveys the dynamics of real hockey, thanks to its game mechanics.

name: Mail Tail
description: Deliver the mail on a beautiful island. Solve puzzles and fight against creatures from below to reach your destination.

name: Simple Rolling
description: Operate the boules to reach the end!

name: Cube Faces
description: Cube Faces is a co-op, adventure, platformer for 2 - 4 players. Filled with unique challenges, mini-games and puzzles! Collect moons, try on new outfits, and find hidden treats as you and your friends explore the sleepy world of Dreamland!

name: Old Lands: Winrinthia
description: 2D Open World RTS with a minimalistic pixel art and a world full of mystery.

name: Slender: Visit into the Woods
description: Slender: Visit into the Woods - is game in which the main character has to fight with a furious and something terrible creature. Dip into another creepy adventure with a "slender" evil! Based on character by Eric "Victor Surge" Knudsen

name: Limen
description: Limen is a 4 player online co-op psychological horror. Stuck inside a simulated reality inflated with nightmares, you must work with your team to find a way out. Build, defend, and survive.

name: VR T72 Battle in Afghanistan
description: Through VR virtual simulation, players are brought to the battlefield of Afghanistan full of gunpowder, and they drive steel beasts to fight fiercely with the enemy in the city.

name: The Lonker
description: Experience bizarre moments, kill strange creatures, explore mysteries, and move forward in pixelated 2D. You are Lonker, a talented son of a missing king and your goal is to find your father! But he doesn't know what awaits him.

name: Relics of Cilldrea
description: A story 21 years in the making, and a development team of a few, Relic's of Cilldrea is a medieval 1st and 3rd person hack/slash and magical combat game. Team up with your friends, kill them, or go it alone... the choice is yours.

name: Outcasts of the Rift
description: Wander through whimsical realms and fight strategy RPG battles in this story-rich, thought-provoking adventure. Use the Morph Magic Scepter to reshape allies, objects and ultimately the world! Will you maintain peace, fight for change, or walk the precarious line of neutrality?

name: Gverse
description: Gverse is an MMORPG developed in the first quarter of 2021. The main aim of the game is not PvP. The main purpose is to create your own avatar and spend time with your friends in the Gverse universe, which is a digital world. So what awaits us at Gverse?

name: Natti
description: “Natti” is a roguelike tower defense game unfolds in the Otherworld of Korean folktales. Place defense towers, collect equipment, and strategically utilize various heroes to defeat all the monsters and protect the Otherworld with “Natti”, goblins in form of animals.

name: Charem of Metropolitan
description: This is a simple simulator with 4 amazing girls you can play with. No bullshit storyline, No uncontrolled animation. Just there for you when you are feeling horny.

name: Medieval Builders: Strongholds & Castles
description: Craft, hunt, and survive in fantasy medieval world. Build your village, manage and defend castles and whole kingdoms. Become a local lord and a builder. Strongholds & Castles are waiting for you to manage them - alone or with your friends!

name: Lavrynthos
description: Lavrynthos is an independently created VR short, a funny and philosophic story that places you at the heart of the labyrinth of Crete to tell you the story of the unlikely relationship between the Minotaur and his next meal: a girl named Cora.

name: Nightmare of Nady
description: Nightmare of Nady - is an old-school 90s survival-horror, third-person action game with fighting elements. Inspired by Van Helsing.

name: Pueblo
description: A small topdown shooter in pixelart graphics.

name: Schnee
description: Schnee is a third-person action rogue-lite game created by one-man developer. Build your own builds from loot, use defeated enemies as your companions, and challenge yourself to see if you can defeat the ruler.

name: Evolution Tale
description: Chop down trees, mine rocks and pick up plants to combine them and craft a total of 500 different items that can be used to evolve and develop new technologies until you reach the modern ages.

name: Just Futanari
description: Exclusively for VR Become a futanari couple and make out, healing time!

name: Rotatex 3
description: Solve puzzles, rotate the level and guide the Cat to the teleport.

name: Sergeant Squidley: Space Cop!
description: There's been a murder in Moontropolis and it's up to Sergeant Squidley to solve the case! But Squidley's life is complicated: He's got an ex-wife who hates him, a son he's ignored for too long, and he's always wanted to learn the saxophone. Will he find time to solve the crime? The choice is yours!

name: The Backrooms Anthology
description: A classic survival game set in the backrooms where 5 survivors try to escape. Unravel the mystery of the backrooms, escape or fight against the creatures that lurk in this terrible and infinite place.

name: Age of the Sirens
description: A story-driven horror game.

name: Blind Sound
description: Blind Sound is a Game about, Exploration and Puzzle-solving. This is a Linear Story Based horror game which sets in a massive science facility in 2015. You will discover tons of thing and find out about the Creepy history of this facility with Full of Subjects That extremely Dangerous.

name: HereWith
description: Hide and escape from demonic dolls in an abandoned hospital building. Demon dolls will seek out and chase the player. The only way to escape is to complete the ritual successfully. A small doll wanders around the hospital. Catch them and offer them to your ritual.

name: Gravitaws
description: Gravitaws is a retro-style stage shooter inspired by Jaws (NES). Explore a dynamic overworld map. Collect research materials and upgrades, while evading an Alien invader. The story is delivered in classic style cutscenes. Fight bosses, survive, collect, fish, and bomb your way to victory.

name: YesterSol
description: With your magical spear that you can throw, recall, and use as a platform! You must explore this ancient magical land while fighting your way to the source of the evil containing the mosquito deity Culex.

name: GunSpectre
description: GunSpectre is a twin-stick adventure game featuring a large open world, an equally sized subsurface, and a ton of action!

name: Water Chaos
description: Water Chaos - 2d game where the player needs to control the fish with the help of four selected directions, and together with it, all other marine life, but many of which can harm the player, and some simply do not allow you to swim in the right direction in order to collect all the lost pearls!

name: Rising City
description: "Rising City" is a city building game where you build your own city with hexagons on the endless sea. By meeting people's needs, you can ensure their happiness and attract more people to your city.

name: Barbelé
description: Do your time, one way or another. Barbelé is an Action and 3D Fighting, 3rd person game. It's a story driven adventure in a french prison which offers players dialogue choices.

name: Catagaia
description: You don't know who you are, you don't know what you are, you just know that something compels you to get to the literal bottom of this world. Spirits and alien landscapes surround you as you get deeper in this under-earth, try to survive and to make sense of it all.

name: Tobii Horizon
description: Tobii Horizon detects and tracks natural head movements via the built-in webcam of laptops, extending your player instincts and senses in an epic selection of games including Far Cry, Microsoft Flight Simulator, Euro Truck Simulator 2, and more.

name: Harvest Health
description: You’ve graduated from Xepheria School of Immunis and inherited your grandfather’s clinic in the Springs Hope Village. Design your own clinic. When you are not fighting bacteria inside the body, mingle with villagers by farming, joining festivals, recruiting friends, raising monsters, and dating!

name: Viral Complex
description: You find your spacecraft being pulled into a nearby temporal rift. Some strange force has disabled all of the ship's primary navigation systems, your only choice is to use the replicant transport device to send a clone of yourself to the nearby planet in search of answers, and supplies.

name: Peaceful Lands
description: Peaceful land is a relaxing building strategy game where you create a beautiful and ever-growing village landscape by placing tiles. Discover, complete quests to unlock new tiles and watch your beatiful land growing.

name: Project Eternal
description: Project Eternal is a deck-building tower defense game. Use the cards you receive as rewards to keep creating unique combinations of turrets and defeat the oncoming enemies.

name: Hollow Survivors
description: Slash through never-ending hordes of possessed creatures and try to survive! Choose from a variety of upgrades to create overpowered builds. Unlock unique characters and discover powerful synergies to aid in your quest to become the ultimate demon hunter and purify the kingdom.

name: SpellTanks
description: Spelltanks is an Action Roguelike where you play as a tank and have complete control over your gun. You can customize it with spells you find inside the dungeons and spells you salvage from enemies. Create your own custom combinations and try to clear the dungeon.

name: Not A Thief Simulator
description: You are a thief who steals in every house without power. Take everything and throw it in your truck without being noticed by the police and become the thief you always wanted to be.

name: UfoScare
description: UFOScare is a roguelike with RPG elements. You are a space ranger who participates in an operation to free Mars.

name: Skybox
description: What could be easier than jumping on a skateboard and driving in a straight line to the finish line? It is so? :)

name: Chosun Zombie Defense
description: Chosun Zombie Defense is a stage-based zombie defense VR game where players eliminate the approaching zombies using weapons from the Chosun Dynasty era.

name: Kitchen Confidence
description: Kitchen Confidence is a restaurant simulation game, with a pinch of humour. The player will get to manage different kinds of kitchens, and to open the restaurant of their dreams.

name: Arcadia
description: Enter into the world of Arcadia, a 2.5D Anime-style Metroidvania. Play as the three unique characters with their unique abilities and world's interactions. Save your homeland from the troubles caused by the huge bird-like Puppets and reveal hidden truths in the underground!

name: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Invasion of the Buffet Snatchers
description: Rude aliens have arrived to sample Earth's legendary all-you-can-eat buffet, and they're sending a smorgasboarding party down to YOUR dining room. Can you assemble and deliver their plates of food before the aliens wreck the restaurant?

name: Prisma Light
description: Embark on an adventure to investigate a mysterious light coming from the mountains. You, the Hero, must fight your way through hordes of fleshy creatures to traverse the fabric of space-time to prevent Veganeti, the Ultimate Essence of Evil.

name: Inside Us
description: Inside us is a cooperative survival horror game for up to 4 players. Plunge into the world of nightmares, gather your friends and find the courage to extract as much Nightmare Essence as possible during this terrifying escape. Remember that not everyone share the same goal.

name: Mr.Wise
description: Mr. Wise is an adventure visual novel with multiple endings. The events in the game revolve around two archaeology professors and their unlikely discovery which can re-write the history itself. But Mr. Wise has another plans for their plans.

name: Sehoni Island: Monsters and Adventures
description: Breed your monster and influence the outcome of a breeding with mutators. To gather the components needed to craft these mutators you can farm, forage, fish, trade and go on adventures.

name: We the People
description: The Year is 2028. You are a Survivor, one of the few left amongst the living dead. You must Fight to Survive in this Hardcore Shooter based in Post-Apocalyptic America. Will you help to rebuild humanity, or take what they've gathered for yourself? We The People refuse to go quietly into the night!

name: Greenlander
description: A brutal top-down action game set in a gloomy Medieval Greenland.

name: Vampire Family
description: “Vampire Family” is an adult visual novel with multiple routes.

name: Trojan
description: Trojan is a stealth game in which you have to extract a file from a damaged system. Sneak through the levels and avoid enemy attacks to get the file and finish the level.

name: Street Basket Challenge
description: This is an original 2-on-2 basketball game in SD style, with charismatic characters, and a game system based on the classic arcade beat 'em up.

name: Top Race
description: Top Race - Racing simulator with a top view, executed in 2.5d, where the player fights against computer AI, participates in races with beautiful music!

name: Tichi3D
description: Tichi3D is a short, low poly 3D platformer which follows Tichi through a variety of locations while following a light narrative leading to a large scale fight against a constant looming presence. Run and jump through the worlds while collecting crystals and going for the best possible time.

name: Immoral Shadows
description: Immoral Shadows gathers the best 16 fighters around, showcasing their fighting abilities in 8 different stages and across 12 different game modes.

name: Mental: The Dark Night
description: Mental is a Single and Multiplayer psychological horror game, with varied story modes and contracts. The main idea of Mental is to offer the best visual and sound experience, so that you immerse yourself in an immersive experience that is as realistic as possible.

name: Detective Rosie Morgan: Death at a Dinner Party
description: When a famous Human Rights Lawyer dies under mysterious circumstances in her Sevenoaks mansion, Detective Inspector Rosie Morgan and her team of indefatigable investigators are called on the scene to find out who murdered the barrister and why.

name: Paper Drifter
description: Manage your power ups to make it to the end of the level as fast as you can!

name: Train Simulator Classic: Euro BR 159 Electro-Diesel Loco
description: Get up to speed dual-mode style with RSSLO’s striking Euro BR 159 Electro-Diesel!

name: Effy: One of Unreasonable "If"
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Pyramid
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghost Wiper
description: Sin descripción

name: Art-O-Ween: Night at the Gallery
description: Spooky Playdate Adventure Game

name: Glitch in the System
description: Sin descripción

name: A Dragon Named Coal
description: Sin descripción

name: Kroniki Elevena
description: Sin descripción

name: Rwby: Vale of Darkness
description: Sin descripción

name: Soar
description: Soar through the mountains at breakneck speeds. Experience the thrill of adrenaline as you maneuver through canyons and fly over majestic peaks.

name: Antique Restorer
description: Repair antique vases, plates, statues and follow a young restorer's journey as they become a master of their trade.

name: Pata
description: This is a tower climbing game, which emphasizes strategy.

name: Anti-Sane
description: You are lost in scary and beautiful universe. Try to stay sane among weird creatures and mysterious places.

name: Labyrinth of Light
description: Labyrinth of Light is a first-person puzzle game with platforming elements. The player can walk on any illuminated wall. Through a giant concrete maze in the Brutalist style, the player saves a withering tree.

name: Survive the Orcs
description: Slay thousands of pesky orcs and survive as much as you can! Survive the Orcs is an Action fantasy game with Roguelike elements. Create the ultimate build to survive the hordes. Explore the map to find extra power, unlock environmental sites & annihilate everything in your path!

name: Machigatta Shain-Kyouiku Mattaku Kimi no Kaisha de ha Ittai Donna Shain-Kyouiku wo
description: Sin descripción

name: Iaido
description: Iaido is a VR First-Person Action Game. The core gameplay is the animate iaido lash simulation. You will fight the enemies with your katana and sheath, Dodge and block the attack of enemies precisely and use iaido slash in the dedicatedly moment is the most fun part of the game.

name: The Risen Survival
description: "The Risen Survival" is a fast-paced game that challenges players to gather resources, craft items, and build shelter in order to survive against all odds. Can you outlast the competition and emerge as the ultimate survivor?

name: Don't die in space!
description: Welcome to our sci-fi space adventure, where players take on the roles of a crew aboard a spaceship as they work together to survive in the vast and dangerous universe.

name: Drift With Your Pals
description: Drift With Your Pals is a casual car drifting game with online multiplayer lobbies.

name: Power Sink
description: Power Sink is a Puzzle-Platformer, set in the depths of an underwater hydrothermal power plant. Explore and repair the station before it falls to pieces from the pressure of the sea and the heat from below.

name: Final Remedy
description: You wake up in an unfamiliar snowy place, you don't know how you got there and you don't remember who you are. Find out the mystery, avoid or defeat the enemies and escape...Atmospheric, story-rich, post apocalyptic walking simulator with puzzle elements and crafting mechanics.

name: Backrooms: No Return
description: Explore the poolrooms in a inmersive cooperative horror game. Immerse yourself in the story of scientists who are exploring the depths of the poolrooms and end up encountering various obstacles in order to find a way back to reality.

name: Kyoutabi
description: Travel the land of Ryuusei, meet new companions and defeat an evil organisation together. Kyoutabi is an Indie ARPG that will take you on a new journey filled with hardship and contentment. Follow Kyoko as she defeats Zenith in story mode, or go online and play together with other adventurers!

name: Uplife
description: Start your own business empire from nothing and become richest man in the world!

name: Justice Seeker: Unsafe Data
description: On a strange night, Axel Zakon, a former police detective and now Private Detective, is specifically requested by the police to aid them in the investigation of a homicide, with some unknown and mysterious reason behind this request.

name: Goat's Tale 2: Plus
description: More challenges await our brave goat, and only with your help will he be able to conquer them!

name: Catching Spirits
description: Catching Spirits, the 2D brawler game that will break the balance in your friendship. Launch yourself into a frantic 3-player chase and fight to defend the colors of one of the three great Tribes of Creation, Destruction or Preservation. Welcome to the fight!!!

name: Ranger Quest: The Elemental Orbs
description: Disaster has befallen you, but hope is not lost. Explore the libraries and learn the ancient incantations to unlock the full power of the Elemental Orbs. Completing your epic quest requires a showdown with the evil Grand Mage Marduk in his magical fortress.

name: Oriental Immortal
description: A 3D multiplayer open-world sandbox with a story based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. Starting as a mortal being, you must fight your way to ascension. Embarking on a path to immortality, gain spiritual and physical enhancements that will shape your journey, and finally, make your own fate.

name: Blockappend
description: A 3D puzzle game where you append blocks to each other by flipping them around.

name: Sheep Lad
description: Sheep Lad is a grand scale Swashbuckling, Role-playing, Platforming Adventure Game, with a focus on combat, exploration, and surreal mysteries. Take on the Role of Basil the Sheep Lad as he journeys into a dangerous land Dungeoneering and Questing in search for his older sister

name: Dead Trip: Hope
description: Take part in the adventures of Lars and Jessica in a world of death and chaos. Surviving among the crowds of zombies in search of supplies and fuel in order to pursue the last hope of saving humanity and defeating the virus.

name: Ternion
description: The fate of all civilization rests in the hands of four teenagers trying to stop their former leader from eradicating all life in the universe after he is driven insane as a consequence of infection by his own creation.

name: Ideal Gas
description: In this Explosive Ballon Based Puzzler, all you have to do is get the balloons safely to the end zone. Simple, right? Use a variety of fans and other tools to avoid obstacles and finish the experiment.

name: Star Surfer
description: Star Surfer is an action roguelike where the goal is survival through upgrading powerful weapons and ship modifications.

name: D&M: Spark of Fate
description: D&M (Dungeon and Monsters): Spark of Fate is a dungeon crawler game that takes place in a dark monster-infested labyrinth. Your goal is to escape from this vile place where you were imprisoned and find your way out using the few resources you find along the way.

name: Folia: The King's Revelry
description: Restore Folia to a world shrouded in darkness as you explore the wonders of the Brazilian landscape to find Talia's sister.

name: Pogoppl
description: Physics-based pogo stick platforming!

name: Silent Harbor
description: Silent Harbor is a first-person horror adventure game that will immerse you in a creepy story.

name: Sisters of Sodomorrah
description: A visual novel telling the story of the fabled city of Sodomorrah, where one hundred and eleven maidens are kept in isolation. What secrets hide behind in the desert that they call home?

name: Daimei no nai Game Rigakkkai
description: Sin descripción

name: Longborn
description: A battle royal like game based on fantasy spell casting and weapon wielding.

name: Bouncing Music
description: This game can create random music by drawing different types of blocks and using the collision of marbles. Through the guidance of mini-levels one by one, you will gradually master how to create music on this music canvas.

name: Bremen Hot Strings
description: Bremen Hot Strings is a graphic adventure that adapts the original Brothers Grimm fairy tale "Town Musicians of Bremen" within the context of 1930s Germany under the yoke of Nazism.

name: Bryce Tiles
description: A Manhattan/taxicab-geometric tile-based isometric puzzle strategy game featuring everyone's favorite 90's anti-hero, Bryce! You'll push boxes across tiles, sands, still waters, rapids, moving floors, ice and coals to move into position! Don't forget to redirect the lasers and evade those enemies!

name: Lost Day
description: At that the day, the world ended. People die left and right. Scream heard everywhere. Yet, this is the beginning of my new life. A life where I could finally found my happiness.

name: Vignette: Memories of Baruu
description: The world is ending - yet even the darkest moments hold beauty within them. Set in the whimsical world of Baruu, you take on the role of a young photographer and help peculiar characters accept their fate by fulfilling their final wishes.

name: Ladybugs and Storm
description: Ladybugs and storm is open world exploration simulation, it is about ladybugs survival through the storm, the mission is explore the towers on tiny islands for some food, so the ladybugs will survive through the storm

name: Hunker Down
description: How long can you survive a post-apocalyptic world? A land overrun with an infected "zombie" population, where you compete with other survivors for limited resources.

name: Suikoro
description: You are now the dice, so roll you to solve the puzzle. You need to think about where you want your eyes to go, because the goal is opened by matching the designated panel on the ground with the eyes on the dice.

name: Eye of D'akess
description: A short, story-centric rpg with turnbased combat, about a journey into the unknown in search of adventure and treasure - pulled ever along, by what awaits them in the dark...

name: Battle Mage
description: Battle Mage is a rogue-like/souls-like/Metroidvania. It features fast responsive sword, bow and spell combat, in an endlessly repeating randomly generated environment. With a narrative that takes the player throughout the massive maze-like world.

name: Benders of Moona
description: Discover the power of healing through the pursuit of mastery in the art of waterbending. Learn new skills, explore a living world full of riddles and mysteries that plague the peace between the material and spiritual world. A hand-drawn 2d platformer inspired by digital oil painting.

name: Hoop Fighters
description: Knock your friends down to the ground and destroy their hoops! Hoop Fighters is an online basketball game for up to 6 players, free from rules. Create your character and join the game. Trip up or slap opponents, do whatever it takes to grab the ball. Remember, there are no rules in Hoop Fighters!

name: For Evelyn II: Shards of Creation
description: For Evelyn II is a captivating adventure RPG in the magical world of Aura. Rich story, handcrafted 2D/3D environments, classic adventuring, choices, and retro pixel art. Explore, level up, and immerse yourself in an unforgettable journey where your decisions shape your destiny.

name: Escape From Dimension-3
description: Escape From Dimension-3 is a puzzle platforming adventure and an atmospheric mix between 2D and 3D, that explores an alien mind control experiment story where you are trapped in this alien realm and you have to uncover deep secrets as you try to escape back to reality.

name: Unsolved Case: Fatal Clue
description: Use your logic and intuition to uncover chilling secrets in the additional locations! Find helpful clues and solve complicated puzzles in a series of interactive crime stories!

name: Sky Haven: AR Merge Adventure
description: Uncover a worldwide mystery as a member of H.A.V.E.N., the agency whose mission is to research and protect the newly-discovered creatures living in our skies. Equip yourself with the agency’s latest gadgets and team up with local Guardians in your city to explore these majestic beings. With the help of your AR-enabled device and agency-issued drone, your mission is to heal, nourish, research, and communicate with an entirely new species. But be careful who you trust, because not everyone has the same altruistic agenda. Even other members of the agency could be plotting in secret.

name: Mission Sigma
description:
Secret services have located and neutralized a known terrorist who has been hiding out in a deprived area of the city for the last ten years. This is where the good news ends. It turns out that on the roof of an abandoned high-rise the maniac has installed a nuclear warhead with a timer on it.

The building itself has been turned into a tower filled with intricate traps and obstacles. You have been recommended as a specialist in such puzzles, and the secret service has helped you infiltrate the courtyard. The rest is down to you.

Can you get past all the traps and preempt a nuclear attack?

name: The Prison
description: Your police force team has been cracking down on criminal gangs for years and taking no prisoners. The last major operation left several corrupt police heads rolling. Therefore, glory is just one step from oblivion. You’ve been framed and put in jail on trumped-up charges. Your friends still have their freedom though. The escape plan is all set, and now you’ll need all the courage, all the cunning and all the luck you have to get to freedom and clear your name. And to carry on your fight for justice.

name: Sanctum
description:
The world of H.P. Lovecraft is full of dark places and mystical creatures that you should stay away from. You received a letter from your close friend Anna, a detective conducting an investigation of mysterious disappearances in the nearby forests. Now you have no other choice but to do everything to save her. In the letter she asked for your help and then you never heard back from her again...

You are about to conduct your own investigation. It is time to visit an old abandoned monastery, where the cult of an ancient deity settled. You will have to risk not only your life but also your soul when you encounter the mysterious force that slumbers in the dungeon of the empty monastery. In order to find out what happened to your friend and get away from paranormal phenomena you will have to face horrifying secrets this dark sanctuary hides and solve ancient puzzles.

name: Signal Lost
description:
The connection with the secret research station “Asgard”, orbiting the Earth, was unexpectedly lost five hours ago. Later on the station moved to a fading orbit. It is just one hour left until “Asgard” will enter the atmosphere of our planet. If the station falls on Earth, it will lead to millions of victims. You are a part of emergency team that has to restore the operability of the station systems, required to correct the orbit. To make this possible, your consciousness will be digitally integrated into the experimental model of engineer robots, which luckily are now being tested on another orbital station close by.

What is hidden inside the space station that now appears lifeless and where did its crew disappear? Find answers and repair the main on-board computer to prevent a disaster.

name: Jungle Quest
description:
During a walk in the park, you found a portal that leads to the mysterious world. An amazing sanctuary populated by animals appears in front of you. But how do you get back?

To find the way home, you have to solve a series of puzzles and explore the mysterious world of flying islands.

name: Pro Mahjong Tsuwamono: Renka-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Buy My Snake Oil
description: A cosy potion-crafting resource management simulator. Haggle and persuade your way to notoriety as a snake oil salesman, making as much money as you can selling dodgy pharmaceuticals to maintain a positive reputation with the townspeople.

name: Orb
description: Sin descripción

name: Sam's Last Nightmare
description: Where does the dream end and reality begins? That's up to you to find out.

name: Kaila
description: Kaila is a visceral adventure set in an unrelentless, vicious world. Take part of an unforgiving story, leading a gang of four unique outcasts on their quest for survival, or die trying.

name: Yuma
description: Yuma is the story of a girl. How will her fate turn out? Will she cope with all the trials of fate or will she stop halfway? You have to help Yuma save the people, friends and even your own soul. Hide from enemies, learn their fears, create traps - and all this in an atmospheric 2D world.

name: Emblem of Valor
description: Emblem of Valor is a rougelike deck-building game combined with RPG elements. Form your party, level up your characters, collect powerful cards and equipments to overcome all threats in the Shattered Realm and prove your valor!

name: Paleophage
description: Paleophage is a third-person dinosaur survival horror game set in an urban resort. Fight or attempt to outrun over ten varieties of prehistoric creature, solve puzzles and uncover the secrets of the Paleophage, a prehistoric biological nightmare capable of reconstituting ancient life.

name: Mega Snaileeyo Adventure
description: Snaileeyo is an open-world, 2.5D and 3D action adventure game.

name: Path of Survivors
description: Path of Survivors is a multi-class auto-battler survival game with roguelite elements. Plan your path in the 1000+ nodes passive tree and craft gear to help your battlers survive in this world. You can have up to six units on your team auto-battling their way through hundreds of mobs on the screen.

name: Last Eclipse
description: Guardians and Gods fight for earth's balance.

name: Mobspawn
description: Absorb your surroundings and repurpose them as projectiles. Ascend the floors of Mobspawn Co in this top-down roguelike shooter.

name: Dragon's Treasure
description: Dragon's Treasure is a Roguelike action game, thousands of characters in a variety of weapons to choose from, free collocation with lighter, combination relic system affect , independent equipment upgrades and synthesis, the dice game events system randomly generated as a result,

name: Mountain Parkour
description: Mountain Parkour is a computer game in the genre of parkour, about a desperate man who went to conquer mountain peaks to test himself and collect various crystals that once upon a time were scattered by someone and left by someone.

name: Frosty's Cold Hard Produce!
description: Twas the Night before Christmas and all through the streets not a creature was stirring but there were some dope beats, From across the town square, covered in a neon glow the gentleman's club was open and it was time to go.

name: Boom 42
description: Experience the nostalgia of the past, reimagined for the present, Boom 42 is a party game for up to 8 players. Join the Crew-42 on a unique adventure, testing friendship and discovering new exciting planets!

name: Nightway
description: Nightway is a multiplayer horror game designed for 1-6 players. In this game, one player is randomly selected to be the monster, a creature who is blind but can hear perfectly. The other players take on the role of survivors who must work together to avoid the monster and escape the forest by train.

name: Subject F-011
description: Trapped in Area 51 on planet Earth, you must solve calculated puzzles to escape this strange planet. Puzzles consist of using enemies' mechanics to your advantage, moving objects to block enemies, and using items that alter parts of the rooms. A spiritual successor to Adventures of Lolo.

name: Eyes of the Ghoul Cat
description: Eyes of the Ghoul Cat is is an action oriented 2D rogue-lite platformer. In this game you explore the lair of Ghoul Cat, where each level is randomly-created and the goal is to hunt down 8 tough bosses. Make your own decisions and complete your unique journey.

name: Spanking Simulator
description: A highly realistic spanking simulation game. Players can experience thrilling spanking punishment plots, or they can use a variety of tools and postures to simulate the spanking punishment in the free mode.

name: Moriarty Chronicles
description: Put yourself in the shoes of Moriarty and plan the robbery of "La Gioconda". You have 3 days and 3 nights to organize everything and get away with it. Remember: Do not arouse suspicion, be cautious, talk to other citizens and avoid being seen at the most crucial moments. Do you think you can do it?

name: Plastic
description: You're a plastic soldier fighting to defend the backyard. An online third person shooter where the focus is on item sets and team coordinated assaults in an open world objective driven game mode.

name: Lost Hotel
description: "Lost's Hotel" is a 3D horror adventure puzzle game which make you explore and find the way out from this mysterious hotel.You have to find the 4 codes that are hidden in different rooms to unlock the way down to the next floor. The last exit is on the lowest floor.

name: Hyperdope
description: An urban survival roguelite. Search the trash. Build capitol. Steal a Cops gun. Piss yourself. Drink a soda. Kill your boss. Buy a mattress. Shoot some hoops. Transcend flesh.

name: Ultimate Chicken Path
description: Waking up in a cold office, where do you look first? You're a random kid who went missing in entertainment complex. Let's play hide and seek with scary robots. Try to escape and tell everyone the truth about this place.

name: Bar Simulator
description: Create a real oasis in the Arizona desert and be forever marked with golden letters in the history of fried chicken! Develop your own recipes that will make your coatings stand out from the competition, as well as provide efficient guest service, by which you will ensure their constant flow!

name: Aposfera Spacetrips
description: Space trips across the your personal universe

name: Mummy Rumble VR
description: Mummy Rumble VR lets you choose what you want to play in a sandbox style. Collecting mummy heads in creative ways to gain new weaponry filled with different perks. Trick your enemies by trapping them in the pit of doom but make sure not to trap yourself !

name: Coastline Survival
description: Coastline Survival is an open world survival game set in lush, beautiful environments. Embark on a journey of fishing, hunting, gathering resources to build your dream home, and crafting gear to master techniques and locations of survival legends!

name: The Wings of Dawn
description: The Wings of Dawn is an open world survival game either survive as a dragon or thrive as a human. The wildlife having evolved entirely differently to anywhere on earth will pose a challenge to everyone. Do what it takes to survive the day and make sure to be in shelter at night.

name: Traveler: The AI Story
description: Welcome to Traveler, a unique and immersive gaming experience unlike any other. In this game, you'll embark on a journey through a series of diverse and fantastical worlds, all crafted by advanced artificial intelligence.

name: eSports Jigsaw Puzzles
description: eSports Jigsaw Puzzles is a free competitive online crossplaying physics jigsaw puzzle simulator where you buy puzzles from the library, solve them, earn coins and break the records! Become the best in the world!

name: Foreign Body
description: Get in, get out. Borough 563 of the Keld district has a Departed problem. Freaks, augmented beyond human recognition. This place… something’s wrong here.

name: Nature
description: Nature is a relaxing game for modern people tired of everyday life.

name: Lhama Clicker
description: Lhama Clicker is a clicker game about reproduce an infinitly amount of lhamas, to increase your production to ridiculous numbers

name: Keeping It Shrimple
description: "Keeping It Shrimple" is a management game where you breed, feed, and care for your adorable shrimp. Experiment with breeding pairs. Manage the water properties of your tanks. Sell rare breeds on the market. With planning, experimentation, and a dose of luck, you may just breed the perfect shrimp!

name: Train Simulator Classic: E60 Electric Locomotive
description: The massive and powerful General Electric E60 electric, born during the formative years of Amtrak and employed also by NJ Transit, now comes to Train Simulator Classic through the superb creativity of developer Reppo!

name: Soul Passage
description: The fate of the unbound souls is in your hands. Take control of Obligor with lots of different skill and weapon combinations, and fight, and explore different planets in Soul Universe. A fantastic 2D hand-drawn Metroidvania with a unique quest and story system.

name: Smithy Shop
description: Combine materials and create countless swords combinations for your clients at the ever burning forge in Smithy Shop. Manage your materials and choose your swords bearers wisely, as every sword counts towards a cause, and you'll soon discover their repercussions, good and bad.

name: Anubis Clicker
description: An idle game about Buying Slaves. Hurry up, collect money and buy slaves, they will protect you from being burned and cursed by Anubis!

name: Cakez TD
description: Get ready to Level up, train Skills, craft Items and build your perfect team to counter smart hordes of enemies. In this 2D Tower Defense game your Skills will be tested to the Limit!

name: Kanzo
description: Kanzo offers a unique third-person action: fast-paced, savage combat, and an unique setting that mixes science fiction with cyberpunk theme. It tells the story of a world that has as of now finished and its tenants who battle to outlive.

name: Bubble Troops
description: Blue Alien is the main hero. When he destroy an enemy, his health and score will increase. But if the enemy bullet hit the blue alien, his health will decrease. Also each enemy's character and bullet damage is different.

name: Project Backrooms
description: Project Backrooms is a 1-4 player exploration game. Explore the subluminal space known as the Backrooms avoiding entitles, puzzle solving, and discovering new levels. Free content updates with new levels, entities, etc.

name: Night Run
description: Night Run is a procedurally generated night time city driving game. Drive, listen to music and look at generative art in the city landscape. The game is designed to be a hypnotic, relaxing and aesthetic experience.

name: Mind Diver
description: Restore a broken mind to solve a twisted case. Investigate a couple's most intimate moments and piece together the events of a fateful night. Pick what to investigate, deduce awful truths, and solve a dark mystery. But most of all, Mind Diver: find the lost love. Before it's too late.

name: Candy Tycoon
description: Do you want to manage your own candy brand? Compete with other candy brands around the world by selling different candies in your own built store. Reach more customers by customizing your store and improving your confectionery. Remember, more customers means more revenue!

name: Project Labyrinth
description: Join your friends in a 2D online multiplayer board game experience. Slide tiles around the board to make paths and collect goals and power-ups. Use the board to mess with your opponents, and take you to victory.

name: Grief Trigger
description: Inspired by my own grief journey, join Azrael and The Ghost on an indie adventure to put grief in a grave. Explore your hometown for grief triggers that distorted memories of your late father. Survive the bullet hells and puzzles inside to make those memories nostalgic again instead of painful.

name: Flyghts
description: Welcome to the world of Flies! Crazy, microscopic and insanely dangerous. Join the online gameplay as a member of one of two teams of four players who will meet in battle on detailed hand-drawn maps.

name: Blightseeker
description: Jump and dash through unknown, labyrinthine worlds in this VR adventure. Fight back against maddened creatures, or cure them of the blight that fuels their rage. Collect treasures, tools, and powers as you search for the source of this ancient ill, and decide whether to quell or unleash it.

name: Eternal Seas
description: Eternal seas is an open world pirate RPG inspired by classic pirate games, set in a fictional island region. Command mighty vessels and lead your crew across the high seas and through lush jungles. Will you find fortune or will your soul be damned to sail the seas eternally?

name: Maya's Dream
description: Solve the puzzle of her memory and bring a lost chapter of her life, back to life. Immerse yourself in her story and unravel the mystery of a stranger's recollections. As you piece together her memories, you'll discover how they connect us all, in a captivating and emotional journey.

name: Take Care VR
description: They are here. Face the darkest horror in this stunning new survival adventure! Follow the path of a mysterious woman and take the challenge of your life. Fight your way through creepy zombie hordes or solve the puzzles to succeed.

name: Void Blitzing
description: Void Blitzing is a top-down action roguelite set in space with randomized levels and a challenging movement system. Fight over 18 unique enemies, Upgrade your ship, Modify your weapons and survive.

name: Zoolovelogy
description: Pair up all animals with one of their own type to beat each puzzle level. Explore and utilize the unique traits of each animal type, tile, and object to find the optimal solution and earn all 3 stars! Make and share your own puzzles using the handy in-game editor.

name: Crystal Squad
description: Crystal Squad is a top-view story-driven twin-stick shooter. Choose one of 4 characters to find the villagers that have been kidnapped. Use a modular weapon that provides varying gameplay depending on the pieces you combine. Play with friends or play alone as you discover the world in Crystal Squad.

name: Convenient Encounters
description: You never know what might happen on a casual visit to a concenience store! Play through this erotic roleplaying game to find out! Experience the story, Interact with characters and environments, unlock new scenes based on your choices...

name: Zotenhold
description: A massive open world online survival Co-Op Pvp wave-based medieval fantasy. Start with nothing - work your way up to build fortresses against the hordes of enemies or raid other warriors to obtain more loot. Enemies grow stronger in power each night. Choose your journey wisely.

name: Remnant Protocol
description: The assassination of the Blessed Mother has plunged the galaxy in darkness. Usurpers rule with absolute authority, and blood flows in rivers of red across the stars. Only the Protocol can restore Her light.

name: Space Guardians
description: Space Guardian is a Koop-Roguelike, with Tower-Defense Elements. Upgrade your Base, Upgrade your Player, survive as long as you can!

name: EthrA
description: EthrA is an RPG/Adventure and open world game that revolves around the misadventures of two characters: Bob and Veil. Both will explore the land of EthrA and uncover a thousand year lie the world already forgot about.

name: Shit Clicker
description: Shit Clicker is a clicker game about destroy the world with an overload of poop, if you are tired of this shit world, you can destroy him with your own shit.

name: Bingo Girl
description: Bingo Girl is a puzzle filling game. The numbers of calling numbers are randomly selected within 1-75. Players can quickly find these numbers on the card and make marks according to the calling numbers. As long as the marked number complies with the award rules, win.

name: Rune Monsters
description: A monster collector RPG that features over 100 monsters of 18 different types.

name: Corduroy Hollow
description: Corduroy Hollow is a first-person survival horror game set in a decrepit mansion tainted by evil and the occult. Discover the truth. Escape the mansion. Above all, fear the Corduroy Demon…and survive.

name: IDentity Rebels
description: Online Open World RPG Shooter accompanied by a captivating story. Filled with an array of encounters ranging from Terrifying to Heroic!

name: Beneath Her Starry Sky
description: A fantasy/adventure visual novel - as Freya Fae, track down the master assassin Orick Genn before he brings ruin to your home city. Rely on faithful companions and make friends with the citizens as you encounter dangers lurking through the streets.

name: Elemental Survivors: Roguelike
description: Fight off hordes of enemies, slay Bosses, choose from a variety of upgrades and combine your spells to create unique and game-breaking builds In this auto-attacking roguelite.

name: Awakening: Into the Stars
description: Become the one and only Captain of the Colony Ship Oberon as it cruises towards the Planet Zaenus with a single goal in mind: to colonise it and make it into a brand-new home for humanity. Such a huge task might seem daunting, but don’t worry, for you are not alone on your journey...

name: Kayak League
description: Kayak League is a fast-paced, physics-driven party royale game where you compete through various types of stylized courses, competing to be the last one standing!

name: The Hero's Journey Through Time
description: On your journey you will meet a wide variety of heroes who are as different as fire and ice. You will meet brave warriors who risk their lives for their beliefs, but also benevolent magicians who use their powers for the good of others.

name: Beau & Bow
description: Beau & Bow! A game about two sweethearts going on a lighthearted adventure. Best platforming challenges and solve puzzles! This game is inspired by handheld platformers from the late '80s and early '90s. Beau & Bow! A great introduction for those new to the platforming genre.

name: Nitrous Firetruck
description: Response time from this fire department has been slacking recently, so Nitrous Oxide has been installed on the firetruck. Located directly in between two cities, this firehouse is responsible for responding to fire calls at both cities and putting out the fires.

name: Party Shift
description: Get ready to party with your friends! Party Shift is a 2-8 player online party game where you will laugh, cheer and test your skills with our collection of exciting and unique minigames. For a night of endless entertainment and plenty of absurdity, grab your friends and shift into party mode.

name: EarthRemnant
description: EarthRemnant is a sandbox simulation game in which you will lead the Keplerians to land and build a colony on a strange planet, develop the planet's mineral resources, collect fossil, wind, solar and other energy sources to keep the colony running, and continuously increase the colony's population.

name: Factory Trashcension
description: Factory Trashcension is a first-person open-world factory creation and optimization game with unlimited possibilities. Play with your friends and design efficient factories to Trashscend without worries and explore a vaporwave inspired universe!

name: Valley of the Old Masters
description: The World has been in the midst of the winds of change. As a wandering artist, you end up in a mystical valley on your journey. Do you find inspiration for your art there?

name: Oathbound: Arena
description: Turn-based tactical PvP combat with high-fantasy RPG units. Meet Oathbound: Arena. This stand-alone PvP play mode of the upcoming MMORPG Oathbound lets you experience the core combat mechanics in engaging 1v1 online battles. Rally your oath-bound units and lead them all to victory!

name: Mindless Breakpoint
description: Mindless Breakpoint is a first person horror adventure with puzzles and some action elements. The game is set inside a huge mental asylum in which terrible things have happened.

name: Chaos Storm: Strategy Edition
description: Chaos Storm: Strategy Edition is a magic style tower defense strategy game. You will be the leader of a specific camp, strengthen your power through constant battle, defend your strongholds, and constantly expand your territory, eventually becoming the ruler of the whole world.

name: Magic Corgi
description: Magic Corgi - 2D arcade game. A precision platformer in which it is worth trying to complete each of the 10 levels, because all of them are stuffed with various obstacles that can injure a harmless dog!

name: Monster Shopper
description: The Monster Market is back open! Use automation to assemble monster parts into the proper monsters, and keep your customers happy. A fun, relaxing, and challenging puzzle game where you have full control over how difficult it gets.

name: Scout Duty
description: Scout Duty - Top Down View is a game in which you need to direct the attacks of allies behind enemy lines. Be careful not to get hit yourself. The victory of the allies depends on your work.

name: Military Division
description: MilitaryDivision is a 2D side-scrolling platform shooter. A large terrorist group has taken over the area of the city. You are the last remaining of your detachment, the liberators. Destroy the enemies and make it out of the area alive.

name: Whispers of Gold
description: Step into the world of Whispers of Gold, a choice-driven mystery adventure visual novel! Navigate the medieval free city as hired dagger Arthur on a quest to find a nobleman’s abducted daughter.

name: GourdsTown
description: In an unfamiliar world, full of gourds, you are left to discover the struggles of living in this tiny town, in the middle of nowhere, with little resources you will need to uncover how to be useful, these town-gourds will need your help. In this adventure into the odd world of GourdsTown

name: Ansoku
description: Ansoku is a relaxing, fun, simple, and yet challenging puzzle game with a high replay value.

name: Star Mercenary
description: This is a 3D top-down shooting game with a huge open universe. You can drive a spaceship to find planets in need of help throughout the galaxy, help them destroy enemies, and earn your commission. Recruit team members, upgrade combat skills, and develop into a powerful interstellar mercenary group.

name: Escape: Left to die
description: In the deepest and darkest place on Earth no one can hear your scream.

name: Towers, Turrets, Turtles
description: Build and upgrade mazes of turrets to Defend your computer tower from the Pea Horde in this bright and colourful Tower Defence!

name: Chinese SimpleLife
description: Chinese SimpleLife is a living environment simulation.

name: Dungeon King
description: Dungeon King is a turn-based adventure puzzle. Player should smash all enemies on tile based map avoiding traps and plan his moves ahead.

name: Dearg
description: Having just picked her sister, Amelia and Alanna drive through the Scottish forests when it starts to rain hard. Stressed and angry from the storm, they get into a heated argument when something suddenly appears in the road and causes them to crash.

name: Vector Wave
description: Drop-in, pick-up powerful weapons and blast your friends into the void in this 2.5D party platform shooter, where the bullets don’t hurt, but the knockback does!

name: Wuxian
description: This is an independent game! It has a unique way of playing. I hope you can enjoy it! It's definitely worth it!

name: Anthro Heat
description: Anthro Heat is a VR sandbox where you can sexually interact with anthro characters in numerous ways! You can lick, grab, suck, fuck, use toys, explore fetishes and much more! Immerse yourself in this virtual world where you have very special characters at your disposal any time!

name: Fincester Tower
description: Overcome the dark and dangerous depths of Fincester Tower and piece together the truth of this world the deeper you go. Prepare, adapt and survive in this Hardcore, Roguelite First Person Dungeon Crawler inspired by the many greats of the early 2000’s.

name: Timekeepers Battleground
description: Challenge the Timekeepers in a series of strategic, auto-resolved mini-battles, unfolding as an epic campaign throughout history. Bolster your units, use your time machine to adapt your board and look for opportunities each round, as the time-ages progress and your deck shuffles!

name: Neanderthallica
description: The fun adventure puzzle-metroidvania in which you can change the weather to affect everything in a prehistoric world.

name: Lifetime
description: Awakening in a land among the stars, play as a cat exploring The Cosmic Island of Recollection in this Third-person open world visual novel in order to regain memories of the life that came before. Search behind rocks, in the grass, and everywhere in-between to discover all 13 memories.

name: Sumtune
description: Sumtune is an application that can mix the input voice with chosen audio sources and play it out in different applications, so your friends can hear it in real-time.

name: Kingdom Islands
description: Kingdom Islands is a medieval city-building game, where you construct a prosperous city on a distant island. As your village expands and your people begin to develop their knowledge of the land, you may explore and visit new areas of the known world.

name: Tachyons: Battles Across the Galaxy
description: Tachyons is a multiplayer spaceship simulation roguelike, where you and your friends take roles as crew on a space ship, battling your way through a randomly generated galaxy, fighting off pirates and alien threats.

name: Crystal Riders VR
description: Test your archery skills in this action-packed virtual reality reimagination of the endless runner genre. Immerse yourself in diverse landscapes, shoot tornadoes out of a bow, battle giant dragons, and much more in this progressively chaotic adventure. How far can you get?

name: A Dream That Never Wakes Up
description: In the game, the character manipulated by the player has an infinite bullet weapon.

name: Breakout Force
description: Breakout Force is a culmination of quirky block-breaking games greatly inspired by Nights into Dreams and like-minded games from the 90s. Rack up points, maximize chains all before the timer runs out. The game will put your tactical and twitch reflex skills to the test, all in strobing Arcady style.

name: Bat Hero
description: Equipped with your favorite weapon of choice, a Bat, embark in a whole new adventure with this brand new arcade action game and defeat the great evil that lurks in the shadows gathering new powers along the way. Ready ? Swing Away !

name: Mountain Madness
description: Mountain Madness is a chilled, stylized role playing game where you lead a team of climbers and helpers as they travel towards the summit of mountains around the world!

name: Ace of Spades
description: Use your investigating skills to solve Zephyr City’s most heinous crimes through the eyes of infamous detective Nick Spade. This steampunk noir city is a rats nest of secrets and lies. Do you have what it takes to earn the title The Ace of Spades?

name: Southern Legends: The Temple Defenders
description: Master the arcane arts of magic and mow down hundreds of dark spawns. Defend the ancient temple and its treasures till dawn! Temple Defenders is a casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can mean either you will survive or perish the night. Gather gold and upgrade your skills/stats.

name: The Orphanage
description: Zack has a simple choice.. Run. Escape. Survive. With lots of puzzles to solve, Keys to find, Puzzle items to obtain to help progress through the game to lead to your escape. Will you live to tell the tale of JJ Randalls Orphanage?

name: Cloud: Telos
description: A young man is among the chosen few to replace God. However, in order to save the world from falling into oblivion, he must overpower those who strive for the title of godhood themselves! Experience the tale of the new gospel along with a host of eccentric characters and decide the future!

name: Overrider
description: Take on a high speed hoverboard adventure through a post-apocalyptic world and stop an AI robot invasion.

name: Journeyman
description: Journeyman is a 1-10 player co-op ARPG/CRPG hybrid featuring Souls-inspired combat, deep character customization, classes, talent trees, and endless procedural dungeon content. Descend as far as your gear and grit will take you, or perfect your build in online PvP.

name: Scree
description: Scree is a roguelike shooter in a physics sandbox. Discover creative ways to fight through swarms of hostiles and outrun the supernova.

name: Undertunnel
description: Leaving the dystopian metropolis behind, a strange & dangerous journey lies ahead. You must venture into the depths of the sprawling Neo-industrial tunnels below. Weirdos, Gangs, Mutants, Machines, Traps, Humour & More awaits, as you make your way through... Undertunnel.

name: The Last Saviour: Search of Truth
description: You woke up as a test subject in an empty, deserted place. Here begins the study of the mysterious sequoia forest, where there are many mysteries, fantasy, wild animals. With the onset of night, there will be a meeting with the "Great", who will lead you to truth and death.

name: Strangers World: The Swarm
description: Go Alone or join your friends and together rid the world of interdimensional mutant creatures

name: Find the Murderer 3
